0.1.name: wordpress/advanced-random-post
0.1.description:
Selects a defined number of random posts from the archive and shows them on the front page

In the options page, you can change: 1. The number of post that will come shown in the Home Page 2. The position in which the post random they will come shown (for example, in second position) 3. The name to give to the title of the post random (To es. "Random Post: Hello World!")

For the latest information visit the website http://www.danielesalamina.it/advanced-random-post
